title: HDFC ERGO General Insurance Company Limited

Policy Wording Add On Covers
Passenger Carrying Vehicle Package Policy - Annual

title: ZERO DEPRECIATION CLAIM
sample_text:
In consideration of the payment of additional premium of Rs. _____ paid by the Insured and realized by the Company, 
notwithstanding anything to the contrary, it is hereby understood & agreed that for the purpose of this policy, in the event of 
partial loss, the depreciation applicable under section 1 of this policy would stand deleted.
Exclusion:
This cover excludes tyres.
Subject otherwise to the terms, conditions, limitations and exceptions of this Policy.
